title: Top Floor Westwood 1 Bed / 1 Bath Apt w/ Balcony+Parking
posting_body: Top Floor 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath Penthouse Apartment In Prime Westwood Location.
Please do not visit property without our leasing agent.
This apartment features laminate wood flooring in the living room, carpeted bedroom, a breakfast bar, and central air conditioning!
Kitchen is equipped with appliances including a stove, a refrigerator, a microwave and a dishwasher.

Perfectly situated in a very cosmopolitan neighborhood, our convenient location puts you within walking distance of everything in Westwood Village, just two blocks north of Wilshire and one block east of Westwood Boulevard, close to UCLA.
Our residents enjoy some of the best community amenities available anywhere.
Take advantage of several public parks nearby or enjoy our picnic area with barbecues.
For more information, call us today at
Near UCLA, Brentwood, West LA, Beverly Hills
